com.team23.weather.gui

Class ChangeUnitsAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team23.weather.gui.ChangeUnitsAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

     class ChangeUnitsAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A ChangeUnitsAction implements a ActionListener to reference a user's action. A ChangeUnitsAction will be triggered when a user clicks the JRadioButton labelled "Metric" or "Imperial" on the ChangeUnitsPanel. A ChangeUnitsAction will update the LocaleSettings for App.
    Author:
    Andrew Bloch-Hansen, Saquib Mian
    See Also:
    App, ChangeUnitsPanel, LocaleSettings, ActionEvent, ActionListener, JRadioButton
